sobre-mim.title: A Little About Myself
sobre-mim.text: Since an early age, my curiosity and willingness to learn have driven me to seek new challenges and knowledge. I am passionate about technology and innovation, always looking for creative solutions to complex problems. I believe in the power of collaboration and continuous learning as tools for personal and professional growth.

familia.title: Family and Values
familia.text: My family is my main foundation, instilling values such as respect, perseverance, and the importance of education. They inspire me to follow my dreams and never give up in the face of obstacles. These principles guide my actions and decisions in all areas of my life.

infancia.title: Childhood and Discoveries
infancia.text: During my childhood, I developed a great interest in exploring the world around me. Reading and studying have always been sources of pleasure, opening doors to new ideas and perspectives. This foundation was crucial in shaping who I am today and in sparking my passion for knowledge.
infancia.imageAlt: Image representing learning and discoveries in childhood

btg1.name: BTG Pactual (Mentorship)
btg1.description: Participated in a mentorship program focused on career development and insights into the financial market, with guidance from experienced professionals at BTG Pactual.

mckinsey.name: McKinsey & Company (Training)
mckinsey.description: Intensive training in strategic consulting, covering methodologies for solving complex problems, data analysis, and developing impactful presentations.

btg2.name: BTG Pactual (UX Design Internship)
btg2.description: Worked in two UX Design internship programs, collaborating on the development of innovative digital solutions for the financial sector and applying user-centered design principles.

bancopan.name: Banco Pan (Internal Audit)
bancopan.description: Internship in the Internal Audit area, where I developed analytical skills and assessed risks and internal controls in a financial institution.

bloomberg.name: Bloomberg (Mentorship)
bloomberg.description: Six-month mentorship program focused on technology for the financial market, with access to insights on Bloomberg's tools and platforms.

salesforce.name: Salesforce (Mentorship)
salesforce.description: Six-month mentorship focused on CRM and Salesforce technologies, exploring the platform's ecosystem and its applications for optimizing business processes.

foursummit.name: Four Summit (Conference)
foursummit.description: Invited to attend the Four Summit conference, an event focused on innovation, technology, and entrepreneurship, featuring talks by prominent market figures.

academico-geral.title: Degree in Software Engineering
academico-geral.text: Currently pursuing a degree in Software Engineering, focusing on the development of robust and scalable systems, applying best engineering practices and agile methodologies.

cursos-extras.title: Complementary Courses and Certifications
cursos-extras.text: I constantly seek to improve my knowledge through online courses, workshops, and certifications in areas such as web and mobile development, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence.

conquistas-academicas.title: Academic Projects and Achievements
conquistas-academicas.text: Participation in research projects, development of practical applications, and hackathons, where I could apply acquired knowledge and collaborate in teams to solve real-world challenges.
